title: Scenario: User selects MLB.TV from menu bar
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from menu bar
custom_expected:
THEN an overlay menu will appear with the following options (in order):
About MLB.TV...
Preferences...
Services
Hide MLB.TV
Hide Others
Show All
Quit MLB.TV

AND all of the options should be spelled correctly
AND corresponding keyboard shortcuts should appear to the right of the listed menu item

title: ***Scenario: User selects About MLB.TV... from MLB.TV menu
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from menu bar
AND the user selects About MLB.TV...

title: ***Scenario: User selects Preferences... from MLB.TV menu
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
custom_steps:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user selects Preferences...

custom_steps:

title: Scenario: Verify any MLB.TV menu keyboard shortcuts
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the menu bar
AND the user attempts the menu keyboard shortcuts
custom_expected:
THEN the keyboard shortcuts referenced correspond with the listed action
> REPEAT for each Shortcut Command listed
